items.sentence: I was surprised when Tom told me you didn\'t need to do that.
I wasn\'t as amused by what was going on as Tom seemed to be.
I\'m convinced Tom can speak French well enough to work here.
In caseÂ you\'re wondering, this isn\'t my natural hair color.
There are more important things we should be doing right now.
This is the same car that was left at the scene of the crime.
I couldn\'t help but feel disappointed when I heard the news.
I didn\'t borrow money only from Tom, but also from his wife.
I didn\'t have enough time to eat everything that was served.
I didn\'t know how much it would cost to get my car repaired.
